procurement_category: Defense, Acquisition and Contracting - Supply and Services
short_summary: Supply and Services Supply and Services
description: The Department of Defense has a requirement to acquire Defense Canada GPS Receiver replacement parts from various manufacturers. Safety concerns have been raised that certain components from non-compatible manufacturers may be able to can be truly compatible with military grade Electrical cable and equipment components
full_summary:
## Defence Advance GPS Receiver (DAGR) Spare Parts

### Solicitation Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of spare parts for the Defence Advance GPS Receiver (DAGR) system.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-7599-70640331
* **Solicitation Number:** W8486-228137/A
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-05T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 5

### Items Required

The following items are required to be procured:

* **Item 1:** CABLE ASSY, SPECIAL PURPOSE, ELECTRICAL
	+ Part Number: 987-5019-001
	+ Quantity: 250
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Options: 60, 60, 60, 60
* **Item 2:** O-RING
	+ Part Number: 200-2470-010
	+ Quantity: 500
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Options: 125, 125, 125, 125
* **Item 3:** COVER, ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR
	+ Part Number: 987-6637-001
	+ Quantity: 250
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Options: 50, 50, 50, 50
* **Item 4:** BATTERY BOX
	+ Part Number: 987-6641-001
	+ Quantity: 500
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Options: 200, 200, 200, 200

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Leslie Hawkins
* **Email:** leslie.hawkins@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 572-2027
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Tender Documents

The tender process consist of the attached document(s) accessible at the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7599
